summary: The diff implements a substantial portion of all four requirements. REQ-21 (Admin Panel) is largely complete with all five management sections, sidebar navigation, and proper access control. REQ-22 (backend admin functions) shows Motoko backend modifications with admin-guarded functions. REQ-23 (aarthiscan.com-inspired UI redesign) shows only a modified App.tsx routing — no evidence of a redesigned Home page, hero banner, Why Choose Us strip, How It Works section, testimonials, or updated footer. REQ-24 (image upload in admin) is implemented via ImageUploadField component. Several REQ-23 acceptance criteria are not evidenced in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero section with a large promotional banner and call-to-action button
missing_requirements.reason: No modified or added Home page component is present in the diff. The App.tsx routing change imports the existing Home component without showing any redesign of the hero/banner section.

missing_requirements.requirement: Why Choose Us / key highlights strip (Home Collection, Reports Online, Certified Labs, Affordable Prices) below the hero
missing_requirements.reason: No new Home page, hero, or highlights strip component appears in the diff. The existing Home page is unchanged in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Health Packages card grid with market price struck-through, discount badge, and Add to Cart / Book Now button on user-facing site
missing_requirements.reason: No updated user-facing LabTests or Health Packages page is present in the diff. Only admin management pages exist.

missing_requirements.requirement: Individual Lab Tests shown in a similar card grid with market price struck-through and discount badge on user-facing site
missing_requirements.reason: No updated user-facing LabTests page card layout is present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: How It Works section with at least 3 steps (Book Test → Sample Collection → Get Reports)
missing_requirements.reason: No How It Works section component or page modification is visible in the diff.
No testimonials or trust badges section is present in any added or modified file.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer with contact number 8886918989, address, and quick links; header prominently displaying 8886918989
missing_requirements.reason: No updated Layout, Header, or Footer component is in the diff. The existing Layout component is not modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Prominent top header with logo, contact number 8886918989, and navigation mirroring aarthiscan.com layout
missing_requirements.reason: The main Layout/Header component files are not present in the diff as modified files.

hallucinated_features.description: Prescription image preview dialog in admin panel that fetches image bytes and creates an object URL for display
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-21 only requires listing prescriptions with filename, uploadedAt, status and ability to approve/reject. An interactive image preview viewer was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Expandable order row showing order items detail in the Orders management table
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-21 requires listing orders and updating status; the collapsible items expansion was not specified in requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Manual URL input fallback in the ImageUploadField component alongside file upload
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-24 only specifies file upload capability for images to be stored in backend. A URL text input fallback was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module added as a separate file backend/migration.mo
hallucinated_features.reason: No migration module was specified in the requirements. All backend logic must remain in the single main actor per constraints.
